price: 18. Mokolo bakofula kelelo bokoya lisanga lisanga.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fatatūna afwājan
